US ad revenue at Musk's X declined each month since takeover -data  —  Monthly U.S. ad revenue at social media platform X has declined at least 55% year-over-year each month since billionaire Elon Musk bought the company formerly known as Twitter in October 2022, according to third-party data provided to Reuters.

Alabama gets new congressional map that could yield Democrats a second seat in the state  —  A federal court on Thursday approved a new congressional map in Alabama that significantly boosts the Black population of a second district and could represent a pickup opportunity for Democrats in next year's elections.

Trump terrified of being poisoned: former aide  —  Former White House aide Cassidy Hutchinson said Wednesday that former President Trump is afraid of being poisoned.  —  “He does have a very potent fear of being poisoned,” Hutchinson told comedian Jimmy Kimmel on his late night show.

Bidens' dog, Commander, involved in more White House biting incidents than previously reported  —  President Joe Biden and first lady Dr. Jill Biden's 2-year-old German shepherd, Commander, has been involved in more biting incidents than previously reported at the White House, multiple sources familiar with the matter told CNN.
